decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 2 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement DAS-1 dated 31/07/2017, Flood Risk Assessment, A-001, A-003, A-100, and A-101 received: 03/08/2017. A-002 Rev A, A-004 Rev A, and A-005 Rev A received: 25/08/2017. A-200 Rev B, A-300 Rev B, A-301 Rev B, A-302 Rev B received: 26/09/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until a construction method statement has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The construction method statement shall include details on the construction process and the protection of the gate posts throughout the construction process.

Condition : 5 - No development shall take place until fencing has been erected, in a manner to be agreed with the Local Planning Authority, about the two gate posts and no work shall take place within the area inside that fencing without the consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a two storey extension facing onto Thames Road.
